title: Ticket #729: Verify Partitionable slots work with Paralllel Universe
description: Verify Partitionable slots work with Paralllel Universe
remarks:
2009-Dec-01 14:42:05 by gthain:
They don't. At least not very well. The problem is that the partitionable slots split on claim, so to claim all the partitionable slots, you need to make several claiming rounds, which doesn't work very well with the way the dedicated scheduler works today.
creator: gthain
